isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY 20-SI SERIES, TYPE 300 (BRUSHLESS) - REPAIR PROCEDURES - DIODE TRIO CHECK

svcproc.title: DIODE TRIO CHECK
svcproc.para: To check the diode trio, remove it from the end frame assembly by detaching the nuts and attaching screw. Note that insulating washer on the screw is assembled over the top of the diode trio connector. Connect an ohmmeter having a 1-1/2 volt cell to the single connector and to one of the three connectors ( Figure 7). Using the lowest range scale, observe the reading. Then reverse the ohmmeter leads to the same two connectors. If both readings are the same, replace the diode trio. A good diode trio will give one high and one low reading. Repeat this same test between the single connector and each of the other two connectors.
